Adding mapNavigation options to highmaps charts

#### Description 

Options regarding the mapNavigation: A collection of options for zooming and panning in a map.

#### Usage

<pre><code>
hc_mapNavigation(hc, ...)
</code></pre>

#### Arguments 

* ``hc ``: A highchart htmlwidget object.
* ``...``: Arguments defined in http://api.highcharts.com/highmaps#mapNavigation.
